#summary JastEMF's Ant user interface.

{{{
<jastemf
    genmodel="path/to/ecore/generator/model/modelname.genmodel"
    outpackage="package.of.integration.artefacts"
    astpackage="package.of.jastadd.ast.classes">
    <fileset dir="base/directory/containing/jastadd/semantic/specifications">
        <include name="calculator/semantics/**/*.ast"/>
        <include name="calculator/semantics/**/*.jrag"/>
        <include name="calculator/semantics/**/*.jadd"/>
    </fileset>
</jastemf>
}}}
